nodes.text: The Z-Gomot Ternbuell Guppat Corporation was a manufacturer which was part of the InterGalactic Banking Clan. Based in the Zug system and head-quartered on the planet Aargau, Z-Gamot Ternbuell manufactured Tsmeu-6 personal wheel bikes. General Grievous used this type of wheel bike during his droid occupation of Utapau near the end of the Clone wars.
